meanings.sent1: The permissiblenesses of certain actions depend on the rules.
meanings.sent2: In this country, the permissiblenesses of free speech are highly valued.
meanings.sent3: The permissiblenesses of eating ice cream for breakfast made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with the permissiblenesses of joy.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the permissiblenesses of using calculators during the test.

meanings.definition: The state of being allowed or permitted.
meanings.sent1: The permissiblenesses of entering the building after hours are limited.
meanings.sent2: He was grateful for the permissiblenesses granted by his boss.
meanings.sent3: The permissiblenesses of wearing pajamas to work were unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The permissiblenesses of imagination know no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The permissiblenesses of exploring new ideas are encouraged in this class.
